meanings.sent1: I esterify the oil to make it smell like flowers.
meanings.sent2: The chemist will esterify the alcohol to create a fruity fragrance.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen magician decided to esterify the butter into a magical potion.
meanings.sent4: Her words seemed to esterify into a sweet melody that lingered in the air.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush strokes esterify the canvas, transforming it into a masterpiece.

meanings.sent1: The reaction will esterify quickly under heat.
meanings.sent2: The compound will esterify when mixed with the acid.
meanings.sent3: The ingredients in the pot began to esterify, creating a delightful aroma.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to esterify as they waited for the results of the experiment.
meanings.sent5: The colors slowly esterify into a beautiful sunset over the horizon.
